name: Diagnostics For Animals (formely European Manufacturers of Veterinary Diagnostics)
goal: Its aim is to represent the interests of European manufacturers of veterinary diagnostics.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Projet de règlement sur le médicament vétérinaire, Réglementation sur les biocides, résistance aux antibiotiques, Transmissible animal diseases (AHC), Biodiversité
